records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING CONTROL OF YELLOW RUST IN WHEAT?
records.KccAns: SPRAY TILT ,(propiconazol) @ 200 ML IN 200 LITERS OF WATER/ACRE.

records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL OF YELLOW RUST DISEASE IN WHEAT CROP,PLS SPRAY 200ML TILT OR SHINE/ACRE IN 200LITRE WATER.
